events.message: I recently received my order but noticed the item has multiple scratches and seems damaged.
The reported issue involves a product defect due to damage and scratches on the item received.
Your case has been forwarded to our support specialist team to handle the damage concerns.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear about the condition of your product. I’m here to help resolve this issue.
Could you please provide photos showing the scratches and damage on the item so we can assess the issue?
I have attached clear pictures of the scratches and damaged areas on the product for your review.
Thank you for the photos. We can either send a replacement or offer a full refund. Please let us know your preference.
I would prefer to receive a replacement as the item is exactly what I wanted, just damaged in transit.
We have processed your replacement order, which will be shipped within 48 hours. Thank you for your patience.
We wanted to check if you have received the replacement item and if everything meets your expectations now.
Yes, I received the replacement yesterday and it is in perfect condition. Thanks for resolving this quickly.
We are closing this case now since your issue has been resolved. Feel free to reach out if you need any further assistance.
